system.notes: Legendary Armour of ancient make. +20 to Strength Characteristic, +1 Size. Power lasts 24 hours before needing recharging or replacing. Armour is sealed when helmet attached, has built-in Auspex, Photovisor and Recoil Gloves. Grants wearer the Sturdy Trait.

description.value: Legendary Armour of ancient make. +20 to Strength Characteristic, +1 Size. Power lasts 24 hours before needing recharging or replacing. Armour is sealed when helmet attached, has built-in Auspex, Photovisor and Recoil Gloves. Grants wearer the Sturdy Trait.
